name: Widescreen Tools
author: OpenAI
description: Experimental widescreen support that relaxes Terraria's forced minimum zoom for ultrawide displays.

overrideForcedMinimumZoom.label: Override Forced Zoom
overrideForcedMinimumZoom.description: Replace Terraria's vanilla world-view limit used to force zoom on large resolutions

unlockHighResModes.label: Unlock High Res Modes
unlockHighResModes.description: Raise Terraria's internal resolution caps and register native monitor resolutions

worldViewWidth.label: World View Width
worldViewWidth.description: Reference world-view width used when computing the minimum zoom

worldViewHeight.label: World View Height
worldViewHeight.description: Reference world-view height used when computing the minimum zoom
